question: Who of the following have been selected for 2017 All-Star Basketball without Borders (BWB) Global Camp?
explanation: For the first time, two Indian cagers - Aashay Verma and Priyanka Prabhakara - have been selected in a 67-strong international group of boys and girls for the NBA and FIBA\'s third annual Basketball without Borders (BWB) Global Camp in New Orleans, USA. The camp will be held February 17 to 19 as part of NBA All-Star 2017. The BWB Global Camp is a great opportunity for the top male and female prospects from around the world to compete against one another, learn directly from NBA and FIBA players, legends and coaches, and experience the excitement of NBA All-Star. The Basketball without Borders program was founded on the belief that basketball brings young players from different backgrounds together and transcends cultural boundaries.
